description.value: You can take a leap of faith and usually land on your feet. You can @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Leap] up to 30 feet in any direction without touching the ground and without requiring an Athletics check; when doing so, you must land on a surface you can Climb or adjacent to an Edge you can Grab within 30 feet of you, or else you fall after using your next action. You can exceed your normal Speed while Leaping.
